channel.title: I'm trapped in bedrock just like nokturth
channel.description:
Ok just like it happend to my friend nok, i'm trapped in "hell" there's a infinite plataform of bedrock and the sky is red. Nok told me that the only way to scape is that an admin teleport me to an other user.
this is what i see:
http://img696.imageshack.us/img696/9313/20110708155901.png

item.title: I'm trapped in bedrock just like nokturth
item.dc:creator: @Nokturth Nokturth
item.description:
@Nokturth wrote:

it happens when you lag being really high in the nether.
the map doesn’t load fast enough and you fall until negative Y turns in positive Y. like the “roof” of the nether

Read full topic
